title: Le Crobag - S-Bahnhof Berliner Tor
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain bakery branch in the Berliner Tor S-Bahn station. Sells baked goods, sandwiches, and hot drinks. Offers vegan baguettes filled with either tofu, basil and tomato, or herb spread and cucumber.
